item.title: Tsatsi
item.summary: About |han≠kass'o's maternal grandfather Tsatsi (Tsa t'ssi), who was a passionate man (which is why he was never a 'sorcerer' or 'doctor'). He only ever listened to |han≠kass'o's mother. Tsatsi said that his daughter had softened his heart towards the people as he would have shot at them, because they had not acted nicely in his opinion.
item.comments: 1) p.8764v: Tsatsi was not a doctor or sorcerer because he was too passionate, 2) p.8767v: see The ||kuken and ostrich feathers and Feathered arrows and poison and Arrow-making, 3) This story is found in Book VIII-31
